items.title: What is Meri Boarding?
items.question: What is Meri Boarding?
items.answer: Meri Boarding provides fully furnished serviced apartments for short and long stays in Stuttgart and Hildesheim.

items.title: Number of locations
items.question: How many locations do you have?
items.answer: We currently have 3 locations: Stuttgart Flamingo, Stuttgart Europaplatz, and Hildesheim.

items.title: Stay duration
items.question: Is there a minimum or maximum stay duration?
items.answer: There is no strict minimum or maximum. Both short and long stays are possible.

items.title: Registration support
items.question: Do you support Anmeldung (residence registration)?
items.answer: Yes. We support residence registration (Anmeldung / Meldebescheinigung) for eligible stays.

items.title: Furnished apartments
items.question: Are the apartments furnished?
items.answer: Yes. All apartments are fully furnished and ready for daily living.

items.title: Kitchen
items.question: Do apartments include a kitchen?
items.answer: Yes. All apartments include a fully equipped kitchen.

items.title: Smart TV
items.question: Is there a TV in the apartment?
items.answer: Yes. Apartments include a Smart TV.

items.title: Laundry
items.question: Is there a washing machine?
items.answer: Flamingo and Europaplatz use shared laundry rooms. Hildesheim apartments include in-unit washer and dryer.

items.title: Climate
items.question: Do rooms have air conditioning?
items.answer: Air conditioning is generally not available; fans are provided.

items.title: Extra bed
items.question: Can I request a baby bed or extra bed?
items.answer: Yes, baby beds and extra beds are available on request.

items.title: Included services
items.question: What is included in the stay?
items.answer: Internet, laundry access, furniture and essentials, utilities, and cleaning service are included.

items.title: Wi-Fi
items.question: Is Wi-Fi free and fast?
items.answer: Yes, Wi-Fi is free. Connection quality is strong, especially where each room has its own modem.

items.title: Wi-Fi troubleshooting
items.question: What should I do if Wi-Fi is not working?
items.answer: Restart the modem by unplugging it for a few minutes, then reconnect. If the issue continues, contact +49 152 064 19253.

items.title: Breakfast
items.question: Do you provide breakfast?
items.answer: There is no standard in-house breakfast service. Paid breakfast options may be available on request.

items.title: Pet policy
items.question: Are pets allowed?
items.answer: Pet requests are reviewed case by case depending on apartment and availability.

items.title: Smoking policy
items.question: Can I smoke in the apartment?
items.answer: Smoking inside apartments is not allowed. You can request a unit with balcony if available.

items.title: How to book
items.question: How can I make a reservation?
items.answer: You can contact reservation@meri-group.de, call or message +49 152 064 19253, use the website, or book via partners.

items.title: Check-in and check-out
items.question: What are check-in and check-out times?
items.answer: Check-in starts at 14:00 and check-out is until 12:00.

items.title: Cancellation policy
items.question: What is your cancellation policy?
items.answer: Standard rule states free cancellation up to 3 days before arrival; final terms depend on booking type.

items.title: Invoice
items.question: Can I request an invoice?
items.answer: Yes. Please contact reservation@meri-group.de or +49 152 064 19253 for invoice requests.

items.title: Emergency support
items.question: Who should I contact in an emergency?
items.answer: For urgent operational or technical support, contact +49 152 064 19253.

items.title: Contact channels
items.question: How can I reach Meri Boarding?
items.answer: Phone/WhatsApp: +49 152 064 19253, Reservation email: reservation@meri-group.de, General email: info@meri-group.de, Web: www.meri-boarding.de.
